short_description: This function generates classification model using NaiveBayes algorithm.
long_description: This function generates classification model using NaiveBayes algorithm.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: Specifies the table containing the input training data.
input_tables.description: Specifies the table containing the input training data.

argument_clauses.name: ResponseColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the response values.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the response values.

argument_clauses.name: NumericInputs
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table columns that contains the numeric attributes values.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input table columns that contains the numeric attributes values.

argument_clauses.name: CategoricalInputs
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table columns that contains the categorical attributes values.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input table columns that contains the categorical attributes values.

argument_clauses.name: AttributeNameColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the attributes names.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input table columns that contains the attributes names.

argument_clauses.name: AttributeValueColumn
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the input table column that contains the attributes values.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the input table columns that contains the attributes values.

argument_clauses.name: AttributeType
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the attribute type as ALLNUMERIC or ALLCATEGORICAL if all the attributes are of numeric type or categorical type respectively.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the attribute type as ALLNUMERIC or ALLCATEGORICAL if all the attributes are of numeric type or categorical type respectively.
